overview: Lavish introduces you to decadent ladies who indulge their every hedonist desire, no matter how outrageous. Featured cover girls Alina Lopez and Skye Blue hit the roommate jackpot, but their mutual attraction is already causing sexual tension. Skye isn't used to big city girls, so how will she feel when Alina shows her what they do for fun? Allie Nicole and Nicole Doshi, Haley Reed and Avery Cristy, and Natalia Nix and Eliza Ibarra are all enjoying lifes finest luxuries: each other.
title: Lavish
